function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Application of green design and environmentally friendly approaches at bee’ah headquarters","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modular construction for emergency hospitals may not have effective pathogen control measures in place, leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission of covid-19 due to inadequate ventilation and airflow in buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate construction techniques for emergency buildings, covid hospitals, quarantine tents","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ineffective building design for healthy environment","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in buildings due to poor ventilation and crowded spaces","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and technical expertise for upper room germicidal uv implementation","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of routine use of upper room germicidal uv in buildings where airborne infection is likely","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of homes as priorities for air disinfection","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient mechanical ventilation systems leading to the spread of airborne infections","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate surface disinfection in unoccupied rooms","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited exposure time of microbes to upper room guv","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective air disinfection","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate air changes per hour ach","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of recapture, drafts, and noise","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low percentage of outside air in hvac system","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of high-level air filtration","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on low ach in hvac systems","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacy of hvac systems for infection control","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of ventilation efficiency calculation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability and maintenance of hvac systems in resource-limited settings, and neglect in resource-rich settings, can lead to ineffective room air disinfection.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of natural ventilation due to building design, sub-optimal practice, closed windows, and variable wind direction and speed.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in rebreathed air fraction raf due to closing windows and using ductless air conditioning, leading to increased risk of airborne infection.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the built environment due to its stability in air and low infectious dose","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective focus on high-level air filtration in central hvac systems for covid-19 mitigation","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 and 2 deaths attributed primarily to airborne transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of germicidal ultraviolet guv air disinfection leading to unchecked viral spread in the built environment.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential development of drug-resistant pathogens due to inadequate disinfection measures.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interrupted or delayed access to healthcare due to pandemic control measures","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased hospital admissions for non-covid related diseases","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Under-reporting of cases and difficulties in getting tested","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete or ineffective implementation of mitigation measures","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate testing policy","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of sqlite database to store covid-19 data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Performance evaluation and testing process","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of a website-based expert system for covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diagnosis of covid-19 using ct image features","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mobile application for covid-19 symptom diagnosis","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of mobile applications for covid-19 risk detection","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recommend building measures not implemented correctly","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on airborne transmission reduction in hospitals and public buildings","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of engineering controls in reducing airborne infection risks","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of air cleaners leading to reduced filtration efficiency","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential ineffectiveness of upper-room guv in killing or inactivating airborne microorganisms due to inadequate uv fluence rate or non-uniform uvgi distribution","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in performance of portable consumer air cleaning devices depending on design and room size","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential ineffectiveness of guv ’in-duct’ application in disinfecting contaminated extracts or ventilation ducts","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased humidity can decrease the inactivation of bacterial and viral aerosols, potentially leading to higher transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential reliance on upper-room germicidal uv guv systems as the primary control measure, leading to neglect of other essential infection control strategies.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recirculation of air in the built environment during an epidemic, including covid-19, can lead to the dissemination of virus-laden particles.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"High"}]}
